articles.description: John Charlesworth from Barnsley was worried about "losing everything", an inquest hears.

articles.description: The US says Israel has "signed off" on envoy Steve Witkoff's plan and that it is waiting for a formal response from Hamas.

articles.description: The Succession writer tells the Hay Festival about his fascination with who holds power in society.
